p: The Climate Research Unit at the University of East Anglia (CRU UEA) has recently constructed high spatial resolution climate scenarios for the Falkland Islands and southern Patagonia [ 16]. Jones et al. (2013) produced reference precipitation and temperature series and used these alongside a set of regional climate models (RCM) developed by CLARIS LPB ( http://www.claris-eu.org/) to predict likely climatic changes for the Falkland Islands. The RCMs used were: Rossby Centre RCM R1, 2, 3 (RCA1,2 and 3), Prognastic at Mesoscale (Promes) and MPI-M Regional Model (REMO) [ 16, 14].
